name: Visiware
overview: About Visiware, Inc. – Based in the U.S. (NY and Denver) and France (Paris), Visiware is providing second screen and gaming solutions and technologies. With over 15 years of experience, Visiware’s global reach extends across 70 countries and 30 operators. Visiware’s products include its PlayAlong™ platform, which allows TV producers and networks to launch next generation social applications such as games and interactions which are synchronized with major broadcast programs. Millions of TV viewers can simultaneously participate during a TV show via the web, their iPhone, iPad or even through Facebook.
